p: A 1971 study by Klein and colleagues investigated the constituents of alkaloids mixtures extracted from cannabis plants and reported the isolated of four alkaloids, namely cannabimines Aâ€“D [ 60]. It was also noted that both cannabimine A and anhydrocannabisativine (isolated in 1976) share the same molecular formular (C21 H37 N3 O2) [ 59].
